easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I’m round and I spin, and I’m often found in a game. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of something that flies in the wind and has a tail.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: A tiny word, and then a bigger one means less.

hard.q: Two friends start at different points on a straight road. One walks 3 steps, then the other walks twice as many steps. They repeat forever. Who will be closer to the start after 6 steps of each?
hard.a: They are always the same distance from the start
hard.hint: Compare distances after equal numbers of turns; use symmetry and pattern.
